item.description:
Join us for our Halloween party. Come dressed up and ready to party. We'll have appetizers, cash bar and dance music. Get creative for our Best Costume contest and win a prize! This is our first Halloween bash so we hope you can make it.

Cost: $10 w/ costume

         $15 w/out costume

Pay at the door.

BuddaC is T accessible for those that don't drive. Take the C train (green line) to the BuddaC stop.

Driving - plenty of street parking.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in their private function room

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Halloween Party!
